table_caption: Pairwise correlation matrix of clinical measures in the participants.
table_foot: Data values represent the correlation coefficients.Gender is coded by male: 1 and female: 0.Log(FSRP score): log-transformed FSRP score; log(hs-CRP): log-transformed hs-CRP; log(ARWMC-total score): log-transformed ARWMC-total score.For other abbreviations, see Table 1.* p < 0.01.
